website_summaries.verdict: A cost-effective cover that can protect your hot tub from inclement weather.
pros: Made of woven polyester with UV-stabilized coating
Double cord closures are adjustable to allow you to control the cover’s fit
Features padded handles for easier handling
cons: Not as durable as some buyers would like

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: Product quality is fabulous. Color is brown. Like an odd chocolate. I thought it was gray. My only issue was the drawstring. It is kind of pointless as it doesn’t grab and serves no purpose really. I bought a new cover for the hot tub that was 700+ dollars I bought this cover to protect that investment and it’s doing its job!!! I have a big dog who uses the hot tub as his stage to the world it protects my cover from his nails.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Bullet Racing

customer_reviews.title: Winter Cover for Ohio Hot Tub
customer_reviews.text: This is a good cover for the outside spa I have here in Ohio. The winters can be every cold and the normally come with strong bone chilling wind. It took me two tries to get the cover pulled tight enough to keep it from blowing it off. I did have to resort to placing some heavy wood blocks on the corners. But I am all around satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mmmrfd

customer_reviews.title: Ripped to shreds
customer_reviews.text: It worked well until it dry rotted and ripped into shreds. Got 9 months out of it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover! Very well made and will last a long time. Easy to put on and take off and holds up well to windy conditions. This will definitely increase the life of your foam spa cover and that makes it worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Victor G.

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy this unless you live where the wind doesn’t blow!
customer_reviews.text: This cover works great if the wind doesn’t blow, ever! They needed to include a way to tie it down. I live in Buffalo and with the weather this winter (75 mph gusts), I gave up having this cover stay on my hot tub after the first two weeks! I put cement blocks on it and it still blew off! Just not worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Raveena covers a superior quality.  Far better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This company Raveena makes fantastic products. Top quality, wish I bought it sooner. Makes it easy to remove snow and ice and keeps uv rays off hot tub cover. Very durable. I dont have to remove it, I just fold open my hot tub cover normally and it goes with it same closing it. No different than without cover. We have the Raveena grill, chair and fire table covers and they are far far superior to other name brand covers. A great value.
customer_reviews.author: S R

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: This cover protects your “expensive” cover from UV damage, sap, and everything else. I wish I would have purchased this the day I got the hot tub. The sun was extremely hard on my cover/lid. This additional cover protects it very well and once it wears down after a few seasons I will order another!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to protect my exposed hot tub cover. Wish I had purchased before. Snow had frozen to existing cover which got ruined when trying to open. This seems good quality and so far have not had further issues.
customer_reviews.author: Krazy

customer_reviews.title: Save your hot tub cover and buy this
customer_reviews.text: In the hot Arizona sun nothing lasts long. Our winds get strong and the UV rays kill anything that isn't metal. While this is our second cover in our second year, we chose to buy the same one again because it's tough, looks good, and a great value for the money. There's simply no way around it, but if you live in a cooler environment, this cover could last you years, and compared to buying a new hot tub cover, this is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: bill grinley

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: have never used a cover for my cover before but Florida sun always eats up my covers so I thought I'd give it a try........just wish I could have gotten it in a smaller size.....other than that I like it and it's going to save me a lot of work not having to care for the new hard cover underneath......
customer_reviews.author: Venus22

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My tub is a little smaller than this so this fit very easy and it looks nice. Its lighter than the last one I had on my tub and that one only lasted a year before it started falling apart.. this one is a different material so we'll see. I hope it lasts. SO far I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Higrpwd

customer_reviews.title: Well priced and fits well.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is working very well for us. It is saving our spa cover from deteriorating so quickly. We used to use tarps, but they were a hassle to the down and rotted out quickly. I will update at the end of summer
customer_reviews.author: Karen N Bussberg

customer_reviews.title: Seemed great at first, then tore in mulitple areas
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the fit, color, and the built-in pull string. Material seemed a little thin. Then it got several tears. At first I blamed the tears on the cats, but on closer inspection, I ruled that out. The tears are in straight lines following the "grain" of the material. Several tears together resulted in rectangular holes. Looks like the material just could not handle the hot sun. I got it mid-June and got first couple of tears around September/October. Kept getting more tears over the following months. Hit June again and it just needs to be replaced. But, hot tub cover still looks great. So it did help.
customer_reviews.author: Marty P

customer_reviews.title: So happy I bought this
customer_reviews.text: So happy I bought this. Great quality. Heavy duty. Fits great. Protects my $800 hot tub cover from the brutal Colorado sun. Highly recommend all Classic Accessories products.
customer_reviews.author: sshells

customer_reviews.title: Hot tub cover - is working well but not sure how long it will last
customer_reviews.text: Update: was good for one winter only. Not heavy duty enough. Covered hot tub for winter. Had to lift middle to make sure water drained off cover. The cover is durable but I wouldn’t call it strong. I did put a tear in it and have been more careful with it since. Cover works well but it’s not real thick. I won’t be able to use this for more than a couple years.
customer_reviews.author: Laren

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a champ and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover a little oversized for my hot tub so that it could fit over the additional cover lift system, too. I then use the built-in pull cord to cinch it down. So far we have not been disappointed. The cover has only blown off once in a wind storm when one of the kids didn't pull it tight enough after last use. I purchased this with the matching grill cover and the two look great in my backyard.
customer_reviews.author: P Gould

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last!  Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I used this cover on my spa for 2 summers, while I use not using the spa. At the end of the 2nd summer (last month), I started to remove the cover and it literally tore into dozens of pieces without any effort at all. It tore as easily as paper (see the video). While this is obviously due to the heat of the sun, I would think the manufacturer would produce a cover that could withstand the heat. This one cannot. At $90, it was not a good deal at all. I will never buy any products from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Covered my bad cover on old hot tub cover. Looks nice
customer_reviews.author: rt

customer_reviews.title: Quality cover... nice color
customer_reviews.text: The material and construction seems top notch. There was not a total fit cover available. 100% BETTER THAN VINYL CRAP that is on every hot tub cover. Put 2 small holes (reinforced ) in cover to attach the lift. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: jkalogero

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, has saved my hot tub cover from harsh mountain conditions and dogs jumping on it
customer_reviews.author: mtn girl

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, if pricey
customer_reviews.text: Pricey, my second one because these only last about three summers in the sun. But it protects my $500 hot tub cover.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Cover
customer_reviews.text: Hot tub covers have a vinyl that goes bad in a few short years. I Love the added protection this offers my Hot tub.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Montalbine

customer_reviews.title: Fits good
customer_reviews.text: Bought a month ago so not sure about the durability yet but it fits perfect and easy to put in and be remove.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be okay
customer_reviews.text: Should have kept the old styrofoam top this would have fit right over the top of it. It really does not give you a good explanation on how or what to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark DeWayne

customer_reviews.title: Can’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I had to return because of poor quality. I would recommend buying a big expensive hot tub cover opposed to this
customer_reviews.author: Barbie velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: We have used this cover to protect our Hot Springs spa. It is great quality and we are extremely pleased with it. It is so worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Beryl Cumberworth

customer_reviews.title: Hot Tub Cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover has decreased the heat and water loss that we experience outside in winter, Will have a better idea after a winter season, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Hot tub cover.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with the cover. I believe that it will extend the life of the hard cover. I would definitely recommend the cover.
customer_reviews.author: GA611

customer_reviews.title: Love this sturdy cover
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well made, stays on the tub, easy to get rain off it. Very happy with this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Baroness Alix

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: We have only had this a couple of months but it seems like it will extend the lid of our cover. Looks good and fits great.
customer_reviews.author: kjac

customer_reviews.title: Out standing cover
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and made better than I could've imagined.... I would definitely buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Daniel O.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My insulated hot fun cover leaks. This fit perfectly over it and keeps it nice and dry. Saved me from having to spend $600.00 on a replacement cover. Looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for and quality. Will do great to extend the Life of my new cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband likes this cover!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cover for our hot tub. Love the design and ease of mobility. Husband happy with cover!
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bullfrog Spa Cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is PERFECT! Fits exactly and looks really nice! The price was right, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B,

customer_reviews.title: Greatly extends the life of your hot tub lid.
customer_reviews.text: We leave this on the hot tub cover all the time. Protects our new (and expensive) lid from U.V. damage and the weather.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Wenzel

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: Fits very well on my tub and looks durable. . The elastic draw string is sufficient but could be a stronger material
customer_reviews.author: woj

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and nice spa cover
customer_reviews.text: Use did for spa cover protection and it really works. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Cesar S. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Not Grey! Beware!
customer_reviews.text: The product looks dark grey in the display pictures in Amazon, however the product I got was brown- chocolate color. Someone should fix this. I decided to keep it since Amazon did not give me the option to change color. Other than that the product seems durable and elastic.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Gonzalez Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Looks strong
customer_reviews.text: A little loose on my 7-1/2' hot tub cover, but looking forward to having it protect the cover
customer_reviews.author: J. Charley

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected . . .
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty cover that will make my new spa cover last for 10 yrs instead of only 3 or 4.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L. Ohanis

customer_reviews.title: Does not cover as described. Limp.
customer_reviews.text: Limp. Don’t purchase . Should have returned mine but needed some coverage
customer_reviews.author: Sybil Ingram, Ph.D, CISM

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality material, good fit, looks nice, exactly as advertised. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: OG

customer_reviews.title: Good looking spa cover
customer_reviews.text: I think it looks better in person. Made my spa look brand new. I really love it. The material feel strong.
customer_reviews.author: PRACTICALTACTICAL

customer_reviews.title: Better than advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my hot tub. Wish I had purchased to use over the insulated cover for more protection much sooner.
customer_reviews.author: billy thomas

customer_reviews.title: very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: our insulated hot tub cover had a few cracks, so we purchased this cover to put over top of the insulated one. works great. nice pull string to keep tight around hot tub.
customer_reviews.author: tammy rheam

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This hot tub cover is very nice for the money. Seems to be very durable. I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori S.

customer_reviews.title: Very very nice and not too expensive!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for our 7.5 x 7.5 spa AND cover that has a lift handle. Very pleased with the material and how it’s made. It’ll be cheaper to replace this than the actual cover. Seems like it will last here in the SoCal desert.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Calif

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay on
customer_reviews.text: This cover easily blows off in a mild wind. The seller had no suggestions. I now have bricks all around the perimeter to keep it on.
customer_reviews.author: papa

customer_reviews.title: Hot tub Cover
customer_reviews.text: Pool cover is perfect for our hot tub ! Keeps top clean ! Should have bought this sooner to protect our tub lid !
customer_reviews.author: Dan McCarry

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does an adequate job at a 1/4 cost of a hard cover. Keeps heat in really well.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Blair

customer_reviews.title: Looks like pretty good material
customer_reviews.text: I just got this cover. My hot tub is 86 in by 85.5 and there plenty of room. Looks like pretty good material.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Fits my CoastSpa 96" Square Tub
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Fit my CoastSpa Bahama with speakers. 96" X 96". Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Drawstring
customer_reviews.text: The overall quality of the topper is good. I'm just thinking the drawstring should be stronger. Moderate wind will blow it off. Not sure how long the cordage will last.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for! An attractive cover to protect our brand new spa. Fits perfectly over the tub, cover and cover lift. Could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: K HALL

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick.
customer_reviews.text: Drawstring won’t hold real tight, sometimes the wind will grab. Sort of expected that, it would of been 4 stars if bound tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Jonas

customer_reviews.title: Just know the size of your hot tub
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use if it was great and it's doing its job
customer_reviews.author: kenneth galus

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy totally useless
customer_reviews.text: Totally misrepresented not sized right sags into spa at least 3 ft. Totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: John doe

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Extremely satisfied with product. Excellent protection for my tub cover.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Blenderman

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly on 86 inch tub
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove!. Will buy me a couple more years before I have to replace the actual cover
customer_reviews.author: Greg D.

product_meta.title: Classic Accessories 55-885-035101-EC Ravenna Water-Resistant 86 Inch Square Hot Tub Cover,Medium
product_meta.description: Size:MediumThe Ravenna collection from Classic Accessories combines a striking style with durability, fade-resistance and convenient features. Reinforced padded handles make removal easy while Double-stitched seams add strength and a stylish accent. Structured vents stay open to prevent wind lofting and mildew and are lined with mesh barriers. Waterproof backing keeps your table and chairs dry while elastic hem cords move easily through a special channel for a snug fit. Striped webbing adds an attractive accent and is unique to the Ravenna collection. Available in several sizes to fit a variety of furniture and grills, The Ravenna covers collection adds style to your patio and will protect for years to come.
feature_bullets: This item will be delivered curbside. To have the item delivered to a location of choice on your property, kindly make additional arrangements with a third party provider ahead of delivery
Fits Square Hot Tubs Up to 86″ Long x 86″ Wide, Cover Is 14″ High
This Is a Weather Cover to Protect Your Expensive Hot Tub Heat Cover From the Weather and Elements
A much cheaper replacement than replacing your hot tub heat cover
Elastic Hem Cord With a Toggle Allows Adjustment for a Tight and Custom Fit

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars211 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
